testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlGateInventoryRequest dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.6.1 [Need to Share Gate Inventory] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Send Gate Inventory Information Upon Request (NTRM 3.3.5.7.1.1}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N54R763_Send_Gate_Inventory_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter = ${TMDD_N54R763_Send_Gate_Inventory_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N54R376_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N54R376_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N54R377_Device_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N54R377_Device_Description_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Control Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N54R378_Device_Control_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N54R378_Device_Control_Type_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Controller Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N54R379_Controller_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N54R379_Controller_Description_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N54R380_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N54R380_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N54R381_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N54R381_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Name - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N54R382_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N54R382_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N54R383_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N54R383_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Name - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N54R384_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N54R384_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Direction - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N54R385_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N54R385_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N54R386_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N54R386_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference Version is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N54R387_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported = ${TMDD_N54R387_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N54R388_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N54R388_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Uniform Resource Locator (URL) (DeviceURL) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N54R389_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported = ${TMDD_N54R389_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported}

Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device URL Reference Medium is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N54R390_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported = ${TMDD_N54R390_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported}

Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Inventory Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.16). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N54R391_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N54R391_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}

Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Number of Lanes - Gate Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.7.1.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N54R769_Number_of_Lanes___Gate_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N54R769_Number_of_Lanes___Gate_Inventory_Supported}

Step 20 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N54R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N54R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}
Step 21 CONFIGURE: Define the message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: RequestMessage: ${RequestMessage}
Step 22 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 23 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}

Step 24 REQUEST-RESPONSE-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlGateInventoryRequest RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N54R763_Send_Gate_Inventory_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter REQUESTMESSAGE = RequestMessage ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected

Step 25 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 25.1 VERIFY that a device-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item
Step 25.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 25.3 VERIFY that a device-id data element exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 25.4 VERIFY that a device-location data frame exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 25.5 VERIFY that a device-name data element exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 25.6 VERIFY that a gateInventoryMsg message was received.
Step 25.7 VERIFY that a device-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item
Step 25.8 IF TMDD_N54R376_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.8.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 25.9 IF TMDD_N54R377_Device_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.9.1 VERIFY that a device-description data element exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 25.10 IF TMDD_N54R378_Device_Control_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.10.1 VERIFY that a device-control-type data element exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 25.11 IF TMDD_N54R379_Controller_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.11.1 VERIFY that a controller-description data element exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 25.12 IF TMDD_N54R380_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.12.1 VERIFY that a network-id data element exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 25.13 IF TMDD_N54R381_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.13.1 VERIFY that a node-id data element exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 25.14 IF TMDD_N54R382_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.14.1 VERIFY that a node-name data element exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 25.15 IF TMDD_N54R383_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.15.1 VERIFY that a link-id data element exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 25.16 IF TMDD_N54R384_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.16.1 VERIFY that a link-name data element exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 25.17 IF TMDD_N54R385_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.17.1 VERIFY that a link-direction data element exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 25.18 IF TMDD_N54R386_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.18.1 VERIFY that a linear-reference data element exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 25.19 IF TMDD_N54R387_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.19.1 VERIFY that a linear-reference-version data element exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 25.20 IF TMDD_N54R388_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.20.1 VERIFY that a route-designator data element exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 25.21 IF TMDD_N54R389_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.21.1 VERIFY that a device-url data frame exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 25.22 IF TMDD_N54R390_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.22.1 VERIFY that an url-reference-medium data element exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item.device-inventory-header.device-url
Step 25.23 IF TMDD_N54R391_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.23.1 VERIFY that a last-update-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 25.24 IF TMDD_N54R769_Number_of_Lanes___Gate_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.24.1 VERIFY that a link-lane-count data element exists within each instance of data frame gateInventoryMsg.gate-inventory-item
Step 25.25 VERIFY that the values within the RESPONSE message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 26 IF ErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 26.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 26.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 26.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 26.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 26.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 26.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to ErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 26.7 IF TMDD_N54R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 26.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 27 EXIT
